CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.getAdminRole AS BEGIN DECLARE @adminRole NVARCHAR(10) = N'ADMIN' DECLARE @id BIGINT = (SELECT r.id FROM roles r WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE r.title = @adminRole)
IF (@id IS NULL) BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL SERIALIZABLE BEGIN TRANSACTION SELECT @id = r.id FROM roles r WHERE r.title = @adminRole
IF (@id IS NULL) BEGIN INSERT INTO roles (title) VALUES (@adminRole) SELECT @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY() END COMMIT TRANSACTION END
SELECT @id RETURN @id END
